thread.title: Tom
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Tom

author: Tom
title: Tom
text: Michael was wonderful in getting back to us immediately after we first responded to the inquiry. There was never any pressure put on us to decide and Michael was great in accommodating our changing requests. I would definitely use their service again and I have already recommended Michael to my family!
